title: The best RAM for gaming in 2022: Top DDR4 and DDR5 modules to pick for your build
content:
Buying the best RAM for your PC build may not be as exciting as, say, picking the best CPU or the best graphics card. However, we think it’s important to make sure you’ve installed a sufficient amount of memory to unlock the full potential of your gaming PC. Also, adding an absurd amount of memory

The post The best RAM for gaming in 2022: Top DDR4 and DDR5 modules to pick for your build appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In this article, we're going to take a look at the best RAM for gaming in 2022. We've recommended both DDR4 and DDR5 RAM modules to choose from.
